root.title: sara lee sle bui 34 pct dim
root.body: sara lee corp sai agre bui 34 pct interest pari base dim s.a subsidiari bic s.a cost 84 mln dlr dim s.a hosieri manufactur 1985 sale 260 mln dlr invest includ purchas 360,537 newli issu dim share valu 51 mln dlr loan 33 mln dlr sai loan convert addit 229,463 dim share note propos agreement subject approv french govern sai
